title: I'm tryna get my. Driver licence but I owe money on my ticket and I can't afford the ticket
question: Well everytime I go to the dmv they tell me I have outstanding tickets so I go to court and get a fine and comunity service.But I still have more tickets that I can't afford to pay rite now and I need to drive I have kids and two jobs thank u
answers:
Depending on the amount of other debts that you have, Bankruptcy could be an option to eliminte these tickets as well as other debts.

By continuing to drive without your license, you are risking spending time in jail. What will happen to your kids when Mommy goes to jail!

Obviously, you need to find a way to resolve this and stop looking for an excuse.

Good luck!
You have to set up a payment plan and get your license back or you should stop driving.

Obviously you're not letting not having a license stop you from driving. At least you can stop getting tickets so you can eventually pay off what you owe..
